name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
effect:
:instant: If the enemy has :morale_positive:, they gain :morale_negative:.

— OR —

:instant: Roll the [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die). On a "0" result, you gain :morale_positive:.
flavor_text: A surprise turn in the landscape finds you in the midst of a grisly scene - vultures picking at the aftermath of a terrible battle. Your cursory search of the remains turns up an enchanted hourglass.
